name: lcm-requester
description: lcm-requster is a wrapper on request module with validation on top of format and rules used

scripts.tests: yarn run unit-test && yarn run func-test
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha  --print both -- --opts tests/mocha.opts -R spec ./tests
scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --opts tests/mocha.opts -R spec ./tests && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
